DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine dietary fat alters insulin requirement type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Dietary Fat Glycemic Control Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-over prospective study require two day admission clinical research center . Subjects undergo close loop glucose control receive diet controlled macronutrient content .
DOC.criteria: type 1 diabetes use insulin pump CGM renal hepatic failure cancer lymphoma malabsorption malnourishment hypercortisolism alcoholism drug abuse anemia ( hematocrit < 36 female < 40 male ) eat disorder dietary restriction Acetaminophen allergy Chronic acetaminophen use Glucocorticoid therapy
